message.body: did you have a good time at the Brooklyn film fest? wondering if I should recommend to to eugene to apply for SD. I have two text threads for you, don't understand
Yeah the films were really interesting. A lot of young filmmakers. Most people in my program were students. Which was weird
The space was amazing and a huge crowd.
cool and that was Brooklyn ff or Brooklyn int'l? any other fests you think would be good fits?
I know there a million and I think we've got most of them down but if there are any that might be an especially good fit
